website_summaries.verdict: Great value for those who need a series of IR filters to block different maximum wavelengths.
pros: You'll receive 4 different infrared filters in this set, allowing you to match whatever wavelength of visible light you want to block, ranging from 720nm to 950nm, giving you more options for your photography
Offers 4 different lens thread options between 52mm and 72mm
cons: Depending on your lens, you may notice some bright, reflective spots in the images you create

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work really well with my surgically altered (removed IR cut filter in camera body) mirror-less camera. Very interesting to experiment with different subjects and landscape photography. Buy a little larger size and use adapter rings with different lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Great for a beginning kit if you are wanting to try infrared photography.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Davis

customer_reviews.title: I have not learned the exposure for my IR converted ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not learned the exposure for my IR converted Nikon D3000.I need to work with it a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley B. AKA Texasgunslinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These filters work on my Nikon D810. Dark foliage appears bright and glowing.
customer_reviews.author: Ohnomomo

customer_reviews.title: Neewer 4 Pieces 52MM Infrared X-Ray IR Filter Set: IR720, IR760, IR850, IR950 with Filter Pouch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, fast delivery, well produced. Very happy and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so if your camera does not have ISO 3200 or greater you are going to struggle to get anything useful. Also know that different l
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Do a little research before ordering so you understand what you are getting. The 950 filter lets almost no light in at all, so if your camera does not have ISO 3200 or greater you are going to struggle to get anything useful. Also know that different lenses act differently with these filters, so don't be to annoyed if you purchase this and you can't seem to get a good shot. Shoot stopped down to get better depth of field results. The carry pouch is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: KenBJammen

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Got the wrong size but my husband had an adapter so it still worked...
customer_reviews.author: Ambi

customer_reviews.text: These filters are well built and the price is great.

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 52mm filters but received 58mm filters. Filters themself seem. Fine and carrying case it nice, but will be returning these
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Works and price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.text: All four perform as expected - no issues. The 950 nm filter ring is slightly larger than the rest, maybe the filter glass is thicker? No effect to function though. The only thing I might change is to swap the 720 nm for a 670 nm for larger wavelength separation. In my Fuji IS Pro the 720 and 760 nm respond exactly the same. If you have a camera that can use these, get them. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Danoid

product_meta.title: Neewer 4 Pieces 52MM Infrared X-Ray IR Filter Set: IR720, IR760, IR850, IR950 with Filter Carrying Pouch for Nikon D7100 D700 D5200 D5100 D500 D3300 D3200 D3000 D90 D80 DSLR Cameras
product_meta.description:
Size:52mm
PLEASE NOTE: Lens NOT Included!

Description:

Neewer 52MM IR720 / IR760 / IR850 / IR950 Infrared Filters are designed to allow infrared radiation through but block all visible light up to 720nm / 760nm / 850nm / 950nm for photographing subjects and details that are not normally visible.

Perfect for:

1.Archaeology, Military, Police, Medical science, and detective work. Infrared filter allow normally invisible stains and modified items visible.

2.Plant vegetation & Landscape photography. It looks dramatically different when photographed in Infrared.

3.Photographic special effects. Infrared filters give photographer expressive and unusual effects.

Tips:

720nm for indoor and weak light use.

760nm for cloudy outdoor at nightfall and brightness indoor.

850nm for indoor and weak cloudy outdoor light.

950nm for outdoor and strong light,such as summer time.

Specifications:

Filter Type: Infrared Filter

Material: Optical Glass & Aluminum Alloy

Diameter: 52mm

Compatibility: Any camera which lens thread is 52mm, such as PENTAX (K-30 K-50 K-5 K-5 II) DSLR Cameras, 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 AL zoom Lens, and Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II and the EOS M Compact System Mirrorless Camera EF-M 18-55mm IS STM zoom lenses

Package Contents:

1*52mm IR720 Infrared Filter

1*52mm IR760 Infrared Filter

1*52mm IR850 Infrared Filter

1*52mm IR950 Infrared Filter

1*Carrying Pouch
feature_bullets: This infrared filter set includes: (1)IR720 Infrared Filter + (1)IR760 Infrared Filter + (1)IR850 Infrared Filter + (1)IR950 Infrared Filter + (1)Carrying Pouch. PLEASE NOTE: Lens NOT Included!
The IR filters are made of high quality optical glass and premium aluminum alloy. Double threaded frame to allow additional filters or hoods.

Fit for any camera which lens thread is 52mm, such as PENTAX (K-30 K-50 K-5 K-5 II) DSLR Cameras, 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 AL zoom Lens, and Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II and the EOS M Compact System Mirrorless Camera EF-M 18-55mm IS STM zoom lenses.
Often used in crime detection, medical photography, detection of distribution of vegetation, etc.
For photographer, these filter can be used with infrared film or digital photography to get interesting artistic and sometimes creative photos.
